Call him the Young Master, Marshal, Brilliant Comrade or Yongmyong-Han Tongji, North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is one of a kind. From allegedly obliterating family members to executing an ex-girlfriend to killing a deputy with mortars — not to mention nuclear proliferation — Kim makes sure he continues to North Korea's absolute master. ET Magazine checks out Kim's reign as a leader.
* Kim is the first North Korean leader to be born after the country's founding in 1948. * He may be the youngest world leader, but no one is sure of his actual age. Some say he was born in either 1982, 1983 or 1984. * At 27, he underwent plastic surgery to allegedly resemble his grandfather Kim Il Sung.
Unicorns: In 2012, researchers claimed to have discovered a real-life unicorn lair, just a short distance away from a sacred temple in Pyongyang. Child Prodigy? In 2015, according to a new curriculum Kim reportedly could drive by the time he was three, was winning yachting races at nine, and was also an expert artist and musical composer at a young age. (Text: Joyshree Baruah, ET Bureau)
